Title: CASE OF TKHELIDZE v. GEORGIA
Conclusion(s): Violation of Article 14+2 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination) (Article 2 - Right to life Positive obligations Article 2-1 - Life)
Violation of Article 14+2 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination) (Article 2 - Right to life Article 2-1 - Effective investigation)
Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed (Article 41 - Pecuniary damage Just satisfaction)
Non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage Just satisfaction)
